item.title: 观看：中国1-2月份的工厂产出和零售销售均好于预期，标志着2024年的稳健开局，即使房地产行业的疲软仍然拖累着经济和信心，但这也为政策制定者提供了一些宽慰。
item.description:
WATCH: China's factory output and retail sales beat expectations in the January-February period, marking a solid start for 2024 and offering some relief to policymakers even as weakness in the property sector remains a drag on the economy and confidence https://t.co/2WHHBNJfO9 pic.twitter.com/TseJ9mpTuW

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 18, 2024

item.title: 观看：中国官方公布了乐观的经济数据，然而，尽管工厂产出和零售销售超出预期，但房地产行业的下行仍然拖累了数据以及人们对中国经济复苏的信心。
item.description:
WATCH: Chinese officials announced upbeat numbers on the economy, however the sagging property sector remains a drag on data as well as wider confidence about the country's recovery, even though the factory output and retail sales beat expectations https://t.co/2WHHBNJfO9 pic.twitter.com/zdV54BF5qp

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 18, 2024

item.title: 观看：Uber 同意支付 1.78 亿澳元，以了结 2019 年代表 8000 多名澳大利亚出租车和出租汽车车主及司机向维多利亚州最高法院提起的集体诉讼。
item.description:
WATCH: Uber has agreed to pay $178 million to settle a class-action lawsuit filed in 2019 in the Supreme Court of Victoria state on behalf of more than 8,000 Australian taxi and hire car owners and drivers https://t.co/8IMy1LLKMI pic.twitter.com/NR692G36Tt

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 18, 2024

item.title: 尽管日本央行正准备对货币政策进行关键性的调整，但分析人士认为，要使日本投资者在全球债券市场和日元交易中持有的约 3 万亿日元资金发生实质性变化，还需要做更多的工作。
item.description:
Even as the Bank of Japan prepares for a pivotal change in monetary policy, analysts say much more will need to be done to materially shift the roughly $3 trillion of yen Japanese investors have parked in global bond markets and yen trades https://t.co/MVAp233AfG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在印度南部一个规模庞大的工业园区内，土地越来越难找，工人们正争先恐后地为那些看好印度经济繁荣或将供应链扩展到中国以外的公司建造现代化的新仓库和工厂。
item.description:
Land is getting hard to find in a sprawling industrial park in southern India where workers are scrambling to build modern new warehouses and factories for companies betting on the country's economic boom or diversifying their supply chains beyond China https://t.co/ru23wuGt49

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 18, 2024

item.title: 尽管房地产行业的疲软仍然拖累经济和信心，但中国 1-2 月份的工厂产出和零售销售仍超出预期，为 2024 年开了个好头，并为政策制定者提供了一些宽慰。
